import axios from "axios"; import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const CardFavorites = ({ movie }) => { const handleClick = () => { axios.delete(`/api/favorites/${movie.id}`).then(window.location.reload()); }; return (
{movie.title}

{movie.overview?.slice(0, 170)}...

Fecha: {movie.release_date}

 ); }; export default CardFavorites; { /* */ }
